こつこつ働く: (こつこつはたらく) - to work hard; to toil; to moil; to keep one's nose to the grindstone; to slug away
こつを掴む: (こつをつかむ) - to get the hang of; to learn the secret to
こつを覚える: (こつをおぼえる) - to learn the ropes; to get the knack
こつんと: (こつんと) - with a bump; with a clunk
こてこて: (ごてごて) - (ゴテゴテ and ごてごて are more emphatic) over the top; thickly/heavily/richly
こてんこてん: (こてんこてん) - black and blue (e.g. beaten ...)
こてんぱ: (こてんこてん) - black and blue (e.g. beaten ...)
こてんぱん: (こてんこてん) - black and blue (e.g. beaten ...)
こと: (こと) - (particle always used at sentence-end) particle indicating a command; (often as ことね) particle indicating mild enthusiasm; particle indicating a gentle interrogative; (at sentence end as ことよ) particle used to soften a judgment or conclusion
ことから: (ことから) - from the fact that ...
ことが出来る: (ことができる) - can (do); to be able to (do); can be done; is able to be done
ことここに至る: (ことここにいたる) - to reach a situation about which nothing can be done
ことこと: (ことこと) - gentle clinking/sound of rapping/sound of rattling/sound of lightly chopping; simmering noise/light bubbling/sound of cooking something on a low flame
ことなかれ主義: (ことなかれしゅぎ) - (principle of) letting sleeping dogs lie; peace-at-any-price; don't rock the boat
ことなきを得る: (ことなきをえる) - to survive without problems; to manage to avoid further problems
ことになっている: (ことになっている) - to be scheduled to (do); to be expected to (do)
ことので: (ことので) - from the fact that ...
ことばに甘える: (ことばにあまえる) - to accept an offer; to be charmed by someone's kind words and do as he wishes
ことほど左様に: (ことほどさように) - so ... that ...; to that extent; to that degree
ことよろ: (コトヨル) - abbreviation of "kotoshi mo yoroshiku onegai shimasu" (please be kind to me again this year)
こと無きを得る: (ことなきをえる) - to survive without problems; to manage to avoid further problems
こと程さように: (ことほどさように) - so ... that ...; to that extent; to that degree
こと程左様に: (ことほどさように) - so ... that ...; to that extent; to that degree
こと足りる: (ことたりる) - to suffice; to serve the purpose; to be satisfied
こと霊: (ことだま) - soul of language; power of words
こどもの日: (こどものひ) - Children's Day (national holiday; May 5th)
こども好き: (こどもずき) - being fond of children; person fond of children
こにちは: (こにちは) - (misspelling of こんにちは)  hello; good day (daytime greeting)
こにちわ: (こにちは) - (misspelling of こんにちは)  hello; good day (daytime greeting)
こぬか雨: (こぬかあめ) - light or fine rain; drizzle
こねくり回す: (こねくりまわす) - to knead; to turn
こねくり返す: (こねくりかえす) - to tamper/to mess with; to go on endlessly
こね上げる: (こねあげる) - to knead thoroughly/to work up; to concoct/to make up
こね回す: (こねまわす) - to knead; to mix; to complicate; to turn into a mess
こね返す: (こねかえす) - to knead; to mix; to complicate; to turn into a mess
このおかげで: (このおかげで) - because of this; thanks to this; due to this
このような場合に: (このようなばあいに) - in this kind of situation
この上: (このうえ) - furthermore; besides; moreover; in addition; further; above or beyond this
この上とも: (このうえとも) - from now on; in the future; further
この上ない: (konouenai) - o máximo, o melhor, incomparável, o maior, de primeira
この上もなく: (このうえもなく) - most of all; extremely
この世: (konoyo) - this world, the present life (em contraste com a terra dos mortos)
この世のものとも思えない: (このよのものともおもえない) - unearthly; otherworldly; out of this world; ethereal
この世のものとも思えぬ: (このよのものともおもえぬ) - unearthly; otherworldly; out of this world; ethereal
この世の物とも思えない: (このよのものともおもえない) - unearthly; otherworldly; out of this world; ethereal
この世の物とも思えぬ: (このよのものともおもえぬ) - unearthly; otherworldly; out of this world; ethereal
この世を去る: (このよをさる) - to leave this world; to die
この中: (このなか) - among these/between these/of these; (このなか only) in here/in this
この位: (このぐらい) - this much; this amount
この先: (konosaki) - além deste ponto, de agora em diante, depois disso
この先の心持ち: (このさきのこころもち) - feelings from this point on
この内: (このうち) - among these/between these/of these; (このなか only) in here/in this
この分では: (このぶんでは) - as affairs stand; judging from the present situation; as things are now
この前: (このまえ) - some time ago/recently/lately; last (Sunday, etc.)/previous
この場をかりて: (このばをかりて) - take this opportunity (to apologize, thank, explain, etc.)
この場を借りて: (このばをかりて) - take this opportunity (to apologize, thank, explain, etc.)
この外: (このほか) - besides; moreover; in addition
この度: (このたび) - this occasion; at this time; now
この後: (このあと) - after this; henceforth; henceforward; from now on
この手: (このて) - this way (of doing); this sort (of thing)
この期: (このご) - now (with the nuance of 'the last moment'); this late in the game
この期に及んで: (このごにおよんで) - at the last moment; this late in the game
この様: (このよう) - like this; this sort; this way
この様に: (このように) - in this manner; in this way; like this
この次から: (このつぎから) - from now on
この程: (このほど) - now/at this time; the other day/recently/lately
この節: (このせつ) - these days; now; recently
この結果: (このけっか) - consequently; as a result
この親にしてこの子あり: (このおやにしてこのこあり) - (proverb) the apple doesn't fall far from the tree; like father, like son
この辺り: (このあたり) - this area; around here
この通り: (このとおり) - like this; in this way; as you see
この間: (konoaida) - outro dia, ultimamente, recentemente, durante este período; enquanto isso, nesse meio-tempo
この際: (このさい) - on this occasion; now
この頃: (このころ) - in those days; at the time; then
この頃様: (このごろよう) - modern; latest; up-to-date
こびり付く: (こびりつく) - to stick to; to cling to
こびり着く: (こびりつく) - to stick to; to cling to
